text: A waffle iron or a waffle maker is a kitchen tool mostly used to cook waffles. It can be made by any material used in kitchen pans, but it is commonly cast- iron. First, the iron gets heated, the batter gets poured into the iron, then the cooker is closed shut until the waffles are done or a set timer is finished. == References == Category:Kitchenware Category:Home appliances Category:Commercial kitchen equipment
title: Waffle iron
